abstract: Wall Street stocks pushed sharply higher for a second day as investors applauded more support from the Fed in helping financial firms work through the financial crisis.
snippet: Wall Street stocks pushed sharply higher for a second day as investors applauded more support from the Fed in helping financial firms work through the financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Despite a sharp rise in oil prices Wednesday, stocks rallied after the promise of more support from the Federal Reserve gave investors confidence that financial firms would work through their problems.

headline.main: A Volatile Session Ends on an Up Note
headline.print_headline: A Volatile Session Ends on an Up Note
